elements.label: Fet
elements.description: That part of us which dreams. The connection to the Mansus.

elements.label: Phost
elements.description: Sight, perception, inspiration, all the Glory's gifts.

elements.label: Shapt
elements.description: Eloquence and understanding. The door opens both ways.

elements.label: Wist
elements.description: Name, memory, that part which remains. (Most librarians know that books have souls; most librarians hope for books with simple souls of wist and nothing else.)
